title: French-Canadian children
brief_description: A study of the home, school, and community life of a French-Canadian family, showing in particular the influence of the French heritage as it affects speech, manners, and customs.
description: A study of the home, school, and community life of a French-Canadian family, showing in particular the influence of the French heritage as it affects speech, manners, and customs.
